description: [Clambling](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0660) can capture keystrokes on a compromised host.(Citation: Trend Micro DRBControl February 2020)(Citation: Talent-Jump Clambling February 2020)

external_references.description: Lunghi, D. et al. (2020, February). Uncovering DRBControl. Retrieved November 12, 2021.
Chen, T. and Chen, Z. (2020, February 17). CLAMBLING - A New Backdoor Base On Dropbox. Retrieved November 12, 2021.
